name: Walid Khan
title: AI Engineer
summary: AI Engineer with hands-on experience in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, and Computer Vision. As a dedicated AI student, I am pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Artificial Intelligence, continuously enhancing my expertise through practical projects and advanced training.

description: I am a passionate AI Engineer and AI student with a strong foundation in machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence. My journey in AI began with curiosity about how machines can learn and make decisions, and it has evolved into a professional pursuit of creating intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.

With expertise in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and various AI frameworks, I enjoy pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in the field, complemented by my academic journey as an AI student.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Artificial Intelligence
education.university: University of Engineering and Technology Mardan (UETM)

description: Problem Solving: Optimized machine learning models during internship, improving accuracy and efficiency.
Communication: Presented AI projects at GIK Bootcamp to diverse audiences.
Teamwork: Collaborated on team-based FYP to develop a university chatbot.

achievements: Developed and optimized ML models, performing preprocessing and predictive analytics on real datasets.
Worked on automation pipelines, improving model accuracy and deployment readiness.
Completed hands-on training in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, NLP, Transformers, MLOps, and Generative AI.
Built and deployed real-world AI projects using TensorFlow, PyTorch, MLflow, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines.

projects.name: Tool Calling AI Agent (LangChain)
projects.description: Developed an AI agent using LangChain to perform tool calling for task automation, integrating external APIs for enhanced functionality.

projects.name: Document-AI-Assistant-RAG
projects.description: Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) based AI assistant for document querying, leveraging LangChain and FAISS for efficient information retrieval.

projects.name: Object Detection & Segmentation (YOLOv11n-seg)
projects.description: Implemented YOLOv11n for object detection and instance segmentation on custom datasets, focusing on real-time computer vision applications.

projects.name: Fashion-MNIST Classifier (VGG16)
projects.description: Created a clothing image classifier using VGG16 architecture, fine-tuned on the Fashion-MNIST dataset for accurate classification.

projects.name: Construction Site Safety (YOLOv11n)
projects.description: Developed a safety detection system for construction sites using YOLOv11n, identifying hazards like missing helmets or unsafe zones.

projects.name: CardioNet – Heart Disease Detection
projects.description: Designed an intelligent system for heart disease prediction using machine learning models, trained on clinical datasets for high accuracy.

projects.name: PDF Malware Detection (LSTM)
projects.description: Built an LSTM-based model to detect malicious content in PDF files, enhancing cybersecurity through deep learning techniques.

projects.name: AgriClimate Risk Prediction (ANN)
projects.description: Developed an ANN model to predict climate-related risks for agriculture, using historical data to support sustainable farming.

projects.name: Diabetes & Stress Prediction Models
projects.description: Created machine learning models to predict diabetes and stress levels, utilizing health data for preventive healthcare solutions.

projects.name: AI Chatbot for University Prospectus
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered chatbot to assist with university prospectus queries, using NLP and LangChain, as part of a team project supervised by Dr. Tariq Sadad at UET Mardan.

certifications.title: Certificate of Appreciation – Kashmir Solidarity Day
certifications.provider: University of Engineering and Technology Mardan
certifications.description: Awarded for services and dedication during Kashmir Solidarity Day event organized by UET Mardan.

certifications.title: AI For Everyone
certifications.description: Completed online course by Andrew Ng, covering the fundamentals and applications of Artificial Intelligence.

certifications.title: Python Crash Course for Data Science
certifications.description: Completed 4-month hands-on training covering Python, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Big Data Hadoop ecosystem.

certifications.title: Certificate of Achievement
certifications.provider: Advanced AI Bootcamp (organized by GIK Institute and the Afeef Karim Foundation)
certifications.description: For commendably securing second place in the project competition at the Advanced AI Bootcamp organized by the GIK Institute and the Afeef Karim Foundation.
signed_by: Prof. Dr. Faisal Ahmed Khalid, SI (Rector, GIK Institute)
